Title: Network synthesis of a topology reconfigurable disaggregated rack scale datacentre for multi-tenancy
Abstract: © 2017 OSA.A performance analysis of a hybrid reconfigurable disaggregated datacentre is presented. It offers substantial benefits in terms of network blocking, power consumption and cost when compared to pure circuit switched and statistical hybrid architectures.
